mapper.select: select sender, receiver, content, TO_CHAR(writedate,'yyyymmddhh24miss') writedate, user_image from oc_msg, oc_user where receiver = #{receiver} and oc_msg.sender = oc_user.user_id order by writedate desc

select sender, content, TO_CHAR(writedate,'yyyymmddhh24miss') writedate, user_image, read from oc_msg, oc_user where (sender, writedate) IN (select sender, max(writedate) from oc_msg where receiver = #{receiver} group by sender) and oc_msg.sender = oc_user.user_id
mapper.insert: insert into oc_msg(sender, receiver, content, read) values(#{sender},#{receiver},#{content},1)
insert into oc_msg(sender, receiver, content) values(#{sender},#{receiver},#{content})
mapper.select: select count(read) from oc_msg where receiver = #{receiver} and read = 0
select user_id, user_name, user_image from oc_user where user_id IN (select receiver from oc_friend_rel where sender = #{user_id} UNION select sender from oc_friend_rel where receiver = #{user_id})

select sender, receiver, content, TO_CHAR(writedate,'yyyymmddhh24miss') writedate, read from oc_msg where (sender = #{sender} and receiver = #{receiver}) OR (sender = #{receiver} and receiver = #{sender}) order by writedate desc
